item.title: The Toxic Avenger Reboot: Cast, Story, Trailer & Everything We Know
item.description: After over a decade of being stuck in development The Toxic Avenger reboot is finally coming out, and here's everything we know so far.

item.title: Wolf Man Is Hurt By Copying A Horror Genre Trend That 2024's Movies Nailed
item.description: 2025's Wolf Man follows one of the biggest horror trends of 2024 but, unlike that year's breakout hits, the Blumhouse movie fails to pull this off.

item.title: The Runtime Of Nosferatu's Extended Cut Highlights Why Robert Eggers' Horror Movie Works So Well
item.description: Robert Eggersâ€™ 2024 Gothic horror Nosferatu has been released on digital with an exclusive expanded version, which includes very little new footage.
